description: Pump HD Sportbuds deliver unrivaled audio for intense activity and extreme conditions. Featuring best-in-class wireless range, PUMP delivers crystal clear audio and is currently the only set of wireless sport earbuds to carry the IP67 waterproof distinction. The military-grade, rugged design protects the premium audio components from rain, dust, debris, sweat and even a rinse under the tap at the end of workouts. With PUMP’s Superfit System, no matter how hard you go, they go with you, allowing you to move with complete freedom and confidence during rigorous workouts and activities. Train, play and live unleashed with the ultimate multi-sport wireless headphone that lets nothing limit where the music takes you.
title: BlueAnt Pump - Wireless HD Sportbuds - Green Ice
